original_title: Dorothy Marie and the Unanswered Questions of the Zombie Apocalypse
overview: A unique dramatic-comedy about a young couple in the early stages of their relationship, facing their first major crossroad when a terrible disease spreads nationwide overnight.  They face what could be their final hour holed up in a basement and amidst it all they must decide whatâ€™s next.  A thought-provoking zombie movie from Rogue Lumen.
tagline: Life is a series of stories with the same sad ending, Death - Or you end up a zombie.
title: Dorothy Marie and the Unanswered Questions of the Zombie Apocalypse
